title: Roborock’s new S7 MaxV smart bot cleaner with neural processing tech, real-time video, more now $90 off
content:
Roborock is its next generation of smart home cleaning robots with the new S7 MaxV series. Enhancements across the board deliver the brand’s most capable and intelligent autonomous robotic vacuum and mopping system to date. Powered by LiDAR navigation with the second-generation ReactiveAI 2.0 system, onboard real-time home video calling, and 3D mapping, the new S7 MaxV series delivers the most convenient, feature-rich, and intelligent cleaning bots from Roborock yet. Head below for a closer look, a nice price drop, and more details. 

more…

description: Roborock is introducing its next generation of smart home cleaning robots with the new enhanced S7 MaxV series.
